https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6szLsmo6pAUwcRMl2AFI4xs5ad3.jpg Two years after the events in 4 the People, a group of four students join up to fight corruption in education. They are angered with the suicide of a student who does not get a loan for her studies. The police department brings Rajan Mathew (Sunil) back from the administrative job that he had been shifted to for killing a student By The People
